Description:
This 4-star hotel directly on Lake Wolfgang offers free WiFi and a balcony in each room. The private beach with deck chairs is a 10-minute walk away.

Seehotel Hubers bright, individually decorated rooms offer traditional wooden furniture, satellite TV, and a bathroom.

The restaurant serves Austrian cuisine and specialities from the Salzkammergut region, including fresh fish from the lake.

Free private parking is available on site. St. Wolfgang can be reached with a ferry leaving just 200 metres away, and St. Gilgen is 5 km away.

Description:
Overlooking Lake Wolfgang, Loitzbauer Ferienwohnungen enjoys a quiet location in the village of Abersee, only 200 metres from the shores. It offers bright and spacious apartments and private lake access.

The famous and very traditional Christmas Markets in St. Gilgen, Strobl and St. Wolfgang can be reached within 15 km and are accessible by ferry, car and public bus. The bus stops 700 metres from the Loitzbauer guesthouse, the ferry pier is 900 metres away.

Guests can relax in the large garden, which also provides a childrens playground, or get active at the Postalm ski area 7 km away. Mountain biking as well as cross-country skiing trails are nearby.

The famous city of Salzburg is 30 km from the guesthouse and can be reached by public bus. The spa town Bad Ischl and the Kaiservilla Emperors Villa are 15 km away.

Parking is free of charge at Loitzbauer Ferienwohnungen. Managed by a private host

Description:
Just 150 metres from Lake Wolfgang, Gästehaus Kloibergütl offers a private beach with deckchairs, free bicycle hire, and free WiFi in the entire property. The terrace and the balconies in all  apartments overlook the lake.

The spacious and bright apartments include satellite TV, a kitchen, a seating area, and a bathroom with hairdryer.

Guests of the Kloibergütl can relax in a sauna, a steam bath, and an infrared cabin. The garden includes a sunbathing lawn and a childrens playground. Free private parking is available on site.

Postalm, the nearest ski area, is within a 30-minute drive. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Pension Schlömmer is located 4 km from Sankt Gilgen and has a private beach access to Lake Wolfgang, just 200 metres from the house. It offers free bicycles for guests and a balcony in every room. Guests have free access to a sauna and an infrared cabin with panoramic mountain and lake views. Free WiFi is available.

In summer, the Schlömmer Pension provides sun loungers and sunshades on the garden terrace. Guests have free access to the Seebad Abersee public beach, 200 metres away. Most of the rooms and the breakfast room were renovated in 2015.

All rooms offer satellite TV, a minibar, and a bathroom with hairdryer. Breakfast is available every morning in the new breakfast room and in nice weather, guests can have breakfast on the terrace, providing panoramic mountain views.

The Postalm Ski Area can be reached in 20 minutes by car. The ski bus stops 500 metres down the road. Please inform Pension Schlömmer in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In the event of an early departure, the property will charge you the full amount for your stay.
A damage deposit of EUR 500 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.

Description:
Haus Wolfgangsee is located 100 metres from the banks of the Wolfgangsee lake and features its own beach with sun beds and free WiFi, which is also available throughout the property.

All of the spacious apartments have a fully equipped kitchen including a dishwasher and a microwave, a flat-screen satellite TV and a balcony or a terrace. Breakfast or a delivery service for fresh bread rolls are available on request.

The Zwölferhorn cable car is 4 km away from the Haus Wolfgangsee. Hiking and cycling trails start directly outside of Haus Wolfangsee.

You can visit the city of Salzburg, which can be reached within a half-hour drive, or explore the scenic Salzkammergut region by rental bike.

A private spa area can be used near Haus Wolfgangsee on request and against a surcharge. Please inform Haus Wolfgangsee in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Please inform the property in advance about the total number of guests (adults/children) and the guests ages.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Surrounded by a 10,000 m² garden with a large sunbathing lawn, Hotel Carossa bed&breakfast in Abersee is just a 10-minute walk from the shore of Lake Wolfgang and a private beach that guests can use free of charge. Free WiFi is available.

The Salzkammergut Bicycle Trail is close by, and the towns of St. Gilgen and Strobl are both an 8-minute drive away.

Description:
Just 400 metres from the shore of Lake Wolfgang, Appartementhaus Huber in Abersee offers a private beach with sun beds. The spacious apartments all have a balcony overlooking the mountains. Free WiFi is available in public areas.

The rustically furnished apartments at the Huber Appartementhaus feature a living room with satellite TV, a kitchen or kitchenette with a dining area, and a bathroom.

Free private parking is available on site and a lockable bike storage room. The stop of the ferry to St. Wolfgang is 400 metres away, and 2 restaurants are within 500 metres.

Bad Ischl is 20 km away, and it is 25 km to the Postalm Ski Area. A ski bus stops 1 km away. Pets are warmly welcomed. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
A deposit via bank wire is required to secure your reservation when booking without a credit card. Appartementhaus Huber will contact you with instructions after booking.

Description:
Only 600 metres away from the shore of Lake Wolfgang, the 3 star superior Hotel Gasthof Aberseehof is set in a quiet location with scenic views of the surroundings. It offers a restaurant serving traditional Austrian specialities.

The spacious and bright rooms and suites all come with a balcony, a TV, a seating area, and a bathroom with shower and toilet. For children there is a playground on site, and guests of the Aberseehof have free access to a private sunbathing lawn at the lake.

The area surrounding Hotel Aberseehof is ideal for hiking, cycling and mountain biking, as well as for every kind of water sports, from surfing, sailing and water skiing to swimming and diving. The  Salzkammergutradweg, a bicycle trail, is accessible directly from the property.

In winter the nearby Postalm Ski Area offers ideal conditions for beginners and families.

Description:
Landhaus Leitner is located directly on the shore of Lake Wolfgang and offers a private beach with a sunbathing lawn. Free WiFi access, and free parking are available.

Surrounded by a 3,000 m² garden, Landhaus Leitner am Wolfgangsee offers spacious apartments with direct lake or mountain views.

A bathing raft and pedal boats are available free of charge, and stand up paddling is also offered on site.

St. Wolfgang, Bad Ischl, and the other attractions in the Salzkammergut region are only a short drive away from Landhaus Leitner.

Between January and March the Postalm Ski Pass can be purchased on site. Please inform Landhaus Leitner am Wolfgangsee in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
This traditional, family-run inn is located directly on Lake Wolfgang, on the road between St. Gilgen and Strobl. Guests can swim, fish and use a rowboat at the private beach.

Seegasthof Gamsjagas restaurant serves Austrian cuisine and Salzkammergut specialities such as fish from the lake and apple strudel. There is a big lakeside terrace in summer.

Guests of the Gamsjaga can use a free internet terminal.

The surrounding area offers ideal conditions for many activities, including sailing, fishing, hiking, Nordic walking and diving (diving school next door).

The Zwölferhorn Cable Car is 5 minutes by car and Bad Ischl can be reached by car in 20 minutes. Salzburg is 35 km away. Please inform Seegasthof Gamsjaga in advance about the total number of guests (adults and children).

Description:
Located on the edge of Abersee, Kloiberbauer is a 5-minute walk from its own private beach area at the shore of Lake Wolfgang. It provides apartments with satellite TV and a balcony with mountain views. St. Gilgen is 5 km away.

The apartment comprises a living room with an open-plan kitchen, a sofa bed and a bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

Kloiberbauer features a garden with a terrace and sun loungers. Guests can make use of the barbecue facilities while children can romp around on the playground. A covered parking space for bikes is provided and the apartment house also features a ski storage room.

A toboggan run starts next to the house. The closest ski area Postalm is a 30-minute drive away. Bad Ischl can be reached within 15 minutes by car and Strobl is 8 km away. Free parking is available on site.

Description:
Located directly on the shore of Lake Wolfgang, Haus Seehof offers rooms with balconies and panoramic views of the lake and the mountains.

The Postalm ski area can be easily reached by car.

Each room has satellite TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer.

A varied breakfast buffet is served in the morning. Haus Seehof has a large garden with a sunbathing lawn and a childrens playground.

A restaurant serving regional cuisine is next to the Seehof.

Haus Seehof has a free parking lot and a storage room for bicycles. Hiking and bicycle trails are nearby. Salzburg can be reached within a 30-minute drive, the imperial town Bad Ischl is a 15-minute drive away. Please inform Haus Seehof in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Gästehaus Weißenbacher offers spacious and modern apartments right on the shore of Lake Wolfgang. Guests benefit from a private beach and free WiFi access.

Each apartment has a kitchenette, a flat-screen TV, and a bathroom.

Free private parking is available at the Weißenbacher Gästhaus. The centre of St. Gilgen and the Zwölferhorn Cable Car are 4 km away. Please inform Appart Weisse Urlauben am Wolfgangsee in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
Offering a spacious and bright apartment with a balcony, Ferienwohnung Kogler is located in Abersee, 1 km from Lake Abersee.

The apartment comprises a fully equipped kitchen, a living room, a bathroom with bath and shower, and a bedroom. A flat-screen TV is featured.

Guests of Ferienwohnung Kogler can relax at the sun terrace, and free parking is possible on site. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property currently isnt accepting guests from certain countries, during dates where such guidelines exist.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Situated in Abersee, Ferienwohnungen Thalmeier is a 10-minute walk from the western shore of Lake Wolfgang. The apartment features a private balcony offering views. The Zwölferhorn Cable Car is 7 km away.

The garden includes a terrace. Guests can also enjoy hiking and cycling in the nearby nature, or swim, windsurf, dive and fish in the lake.

Thalmeier Ferienwohnung is within a 5-minute walk to the local shops, restaurants and bus stop. The Postalm Ski Area can be reached by car in 25 minutes. Please inform Ferienwohnungen Thalmeier in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
Featuring garden views, Haus Seehof - Ferienhaus provides accommodation with a garden and a patio, around 35 km from Salzburg Central Station. This beachfront property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi.

Providing a terrace and mountain views, the holiday home includes 1 bedroom, a living room, satellite flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a bath. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge.

Mirabell Palace is 35 km from the holiday home, while Kapuzinerberg & Capuchin Monastery is 35 km away. The nearest airport is Salzburg W. A. Mozart Airport, 50 km from Haus Seehof - Ferienhaus. Please inform Haus Seehof - Ferienhaus in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Ferienhaus Viktoria is located in quiet surroundings between Lienz and Sillian, 3 km from the Hochpustertal Ski Area and offers you modern apartments with balcony and dishwasher. The ski bus stops just 50 metres away.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels, parquet flooring and mountain views are further features of the Viktoria apartments. During summer you can make use of the garden with sun loungers and barbecue facilities.

Fresh bread rolls can be delivered to your apartment every morning and breakfast is offered on request. Ferienhaus Viktoria also has a bar offering drinks and snacks. The centre of Abfaltersbach with restaurants and a supermarket is 800 meters away.

The Thurntaler Cable Car can be reached within a 5-minute drive. The town of Lienz is 20 km away. Hiking and biking trails as well as a cross-country skiing track pass the house. Please inform Ferienhaus Viktoria in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Please note that the sauna is only available in the winter months.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Basilica of St. Michael

Location : With a stay at Landgasthof Bogner in Absam, you ll be steps from Basilica of St. Michael and a 4-minute drive from Rathaus. This 4-star hotel is 6.9 mi (11.1 km) from Golden Roof and 1.2 mi (1.9 km) from Parish Church of St. Nicholas.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 34 guestrooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Dining : Enjoy local cuisine at Gasthof Bogner, a restaurant where you can take in the garden view and dine alfresco. Or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee.

Renovations : The following facilities are closed on Sunday and Monday:

  • Dining venue(s)

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • This property accepts major credit cards
  • Safety features at this property include a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, a security system, and a first aid kit
  • Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property

Special Instructions : The front desk is open daily from 7:00 AM - 10:00 PM. To make arrangements for check-in please contact the property ahead of time using the information on the booking confirmation. If you are planning to arrive after 10:00 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests planning to arrive outside of normal check-in hours must contact the property in advance for check-in instructions and lockbox information. Guests can access their accommodation through a private entrance. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the booking confirmation. Check-in hours are from 3 PM-5 PM on Sundays. Guests planning to arrive outside of normal check-in hours must contact this property in advance to arrange check-in.

Description:
Located in Absam, a 10-minute drive from Innsbruck, Gasthof Ebner offers an in-house reataurant, free WiFi and rooms with mountain views. Home-made beer, schnapps and apple juice is served.

Rooms at Gasthof Ebner also have satellite TV and a seating area. Private bathrooms come with a shower.

Tyrolean dishes and a buffet breakfast are served at the restaurant, which is traditionally decorated and has a bar. In nice weather, guests can relax out on the terrace or play in the garden.

Seegrube, Glungezer and Patscherkofel cable cars are 10 km away. No ski bus is available. A deposit via bank wire is required to secure your reservation. Gasthof Ebner will contact you with instructions after booking.

Please note that the restaurant is closed on Mondays.

Description:
Situated just 1 km from Abtenau, this farmhouse has its own stables and offers horse riding. Its apartment has a balcony and views of the Tennengebirge Mountains.

Krötzhofs apartment has a fully equipped kitchen, with a dishwasher and microwave, and there is a dining area and a living room with sofas and cable TV. Bed linen and towels are provided in every room, and baby chairs and cots are available.

There is free WiFi and, in the summer, guests can find a swimming pool and barbecue facilities in the garden.

In the winter, Krötzhof provides horse-drawn sleigh rides, and there is a cross-country ski trail next to the house. The ski lift is 800 metres away, and guests can take the free ski bus to Dachstein-West, which stops 150 metres away.

There is a restaurant in the immediate vicinity and the nearest train station is Golling-Abtenau, located 20 km away. Please inform Krötzhof in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Karkogel Cable Car

Location : When you stay at Genuss- und Vitalhotel Moisl in Abtenau, you ll be near ski lifts and within a 5-minute drive of Karkogel Cable Car. This 4-star hotel is 2.3 mi (3.7 km) from Tennen Mountains and 6.5 mi (10.4 km) from Lammerklamm Gorge.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 70 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Dining : Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at the hotel s restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the room service. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:30 AM to 10 AM.

CheckIn Instructions :

Description:
Situated 7 km outside of Abtenau, Apartmenthaus Vergissmeinnicht enjoys a sunny location. It offers apartments with flat-screen cable TVs, a DVD player and free access to Wi-Fi.

All kitchenettes are equipped with kitchenware, a refrigerator and a tea/coffee maker. Towels and linen are provided and fresh bread rolls can be delivered to your apartment every morning.

Guests of the Vergissmeinnicht can benefit from the on-site ski storage room. The chair lift in Abtenau and the Dachstein-West Ski Area in Rußbach are 6 km away.

A childrens playground with a ping-pong table and a sandpit is available in the garden. Barbecue facilities and a garden hut are at guests disposal. Summer sports facilities like horseback riding and tennis courts are 2 km away.

Salzburg can be reached within 50 km. The Adventure Mountain Karkogel is only 6km away - there you can play minigolf or have fun at the summer tobbogan run. Free private parking is provided at Apartmenthaus Vergissmeinnicht. Please inform Apartmenthaus Vergissmeinnicht in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property currently isnt accepting guests from certain countries, during dates where such guidelines exist.
Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.
Swimming pool #1 is closed from Thu 15 Sept 2022 until Mon 01 May 2023
Managed by a private host

Description:
Located in the centre of Abtenau, the Lammertalerhof features a traditional restaurant, a sauna, a solarium, and a sun terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The traditionally furnished rooms offer satellite TV, a safe, and a bathroom with hairdryer. Most have a balcony.

The Lammertalerhofs restaurant serves regional and international cuisine. A rich breakfast buffet with a selection of organic products is available each morning.

Free private parking is available at the Lammertalerhof.

Description:
Only 500 metres from the centre of Abtenau, the Sonnenhof offers a balcony in each room. It features a sauna, a solarium, and a fitness centre.

The traditionally furnished rooms at Gasthaus Sonnenhof provide cable TV, a safe, and a bathroom.

At the Sonnenhof, guests can play table tennis and relax on the sun terrace.

A cross-country ski run is right outside. In summer, guests enjoy free admission to Abtenaus public outdoor pool, located right next to the Sonnenhof.

Free private parking is available at Gasthaus Sonnenhof. A free ski bus stops 500 metres away and takes guests to the Dachstein West ski area in 10 minutes.

Description:
In a quiet location in the centre of the picturesque town of Abtenau, this family-run 4-star superior hotel offers panoramic views of the surrounding mountains, an extensive leisure and fitness area, a indoor pool, and spa facilities such as saunas, a steam bath, and a sun bed. Massages and beauty treatments are also available.

The restaurant at Aktiv- und Wellnesshotel Gutjahr features a terrace and serves Austrian and international cuisine, as well as regional specialities, homemade pastries, and a selection of fine wines. Half-board is available at an additional cost.

The Gutjahr-Alm is the hotels own mountain hut, where traditional evenings and dance nights with live music take place regularly.

Many sports facilities can be found in the immediate vicinity of the Gutjahr Hotel. Guided hikes and individual excursions are available.

Free guided cycling tours with the propertys owner can be requested and guests can rent different kinds of bicycles on site.

Sights such as Salzburg, the Salzkammergut with its lakes, and the Dachstein region can be reached quickly. Guests enjoy free access to the local outdoor pools, 200 metres away. Please note that pets are not allowed in the restaurant. They can be brought to the bar.

Please note further that extra beds and baby cots are available on request and for a surcharge. Contact details are stated in the booking confirmation.

Description:
Located in Abtenau, 34 km from Eisriesenwelt Werfen, Hotel Voglauerhof provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel features free WiFi and a bar. The property is non-smoking and is set 41 km from Hohensalzburg Fortress.

At the hotel, each room includes a desk, a patio with a river view, a private bathroom, a TV, bed linen and towels. Each room has a safety deposit box, while selected rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also offer mountain views. Guest rooms include a wardrobe.

Guests at Hotel Voglauerhof can enjoy a continental breakfast.

The accommodation offers a childrens playground. Guests at Hotel Voglauerhof will be able to enjoy activities in and around Abtenau, like hiking, skiing and cycling.

Kapuzinerberg & Capuchin Monastery is 42 km from the hotel, while Mozarts Birthplace is 42 km away. The nearest airport is Salzburg W. A. Mozart Airport, 45 km from Hotel Voglauerhof.

Description:
Gasthof Weißes Rössl is located on the market square in the centre of Abtenau in the Lammertal valley. Wi-Fi access and parking are available free of charge.

Most of the rustically furnished rooms have a balcony.

The 2 restaurants serve regional specialities and international cuisine. Gasthof Weißes Rössl also has a beer garden on the market square.

Abtenau and the surrounding area offer a wide range of sports and leisure options in every season. Managed by a private host

Description:
Located in the scenic Lammer Valley between Abtenau and Annaberg, Alpenapartments Unterschlag has an outdoor pool and a large sun terrace. Each apartment offers a balcony. Free WiFi is available in the entire property.

Refurbished in 2014, the modern Alpine-style apartments feature a well-equipped kitchen with dishwasher, a dining area, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The bathrooms are fitted with a shower and a hairdryer.

On request, fresh bread rolls can be delivered to the apartments.

There is a sauna and a small fitness room. Free private parking is available on site.

The free ski bus stops just 2 km away, offering connection to the Dachstein West Ski Area, which is located 5 km away. Please inform Alpenapartments Unterschlag in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Karkogel Cable Car

Location : With a stay at Der Abtenauer in Abtenau, you ll be steps from Dachstein West Ski Area and a 2-minute drive from Karkogel Cable Car. This ski hotel is 25.8 mi (41.5 km) from Wolfgangsee and 6.4 mi (10.4 km) from Lammerklamm Gorge.

Rooms : Stay in one of 57 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms with bathtubs or showers are provided. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining : At Der Abtenauer, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.

Description:
Poschenhof, Untere Sonnleiten is set in Abtenau and offers a restaurant, a bar and ski-to-door access. The accommodation is 48 km from Schönau am Königssee, and guests benefit from private parking available on site and free WiFi.

Featuring garden and city views, this apartment offers 2 bedrooms and opens to a balcony. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

A terrace is available on site and skiing can be enjoyed within close proximity of the apartment.

Berchtesgaden is 44 km from Poschenhof, Untere Sonnleiten, while Salzburg is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Salzburg W. A. Mozart Airport, 49 km from the accommodation. Managed by a private host

Description:

Location : When you stay at Hotel Post in Abtenau, you ll be near ski lifts and 14 minutes by foot from Karkogel Cable Car. This 4-star hotel is 2.2 mi (3.5 km) from Tennen Mountains and 6.4 mi (10.3 km) from Lammerklamm Gorge.

Rooms : Stay in one of 58 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms with bathtubs or showers are provided. Conveniences include safes, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining : Enjoy a meal at Postwirt, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel s room service. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.

Description:
Only a 10-minute walk away from the centre of Abtenau, this hotel and restaurant is right next to the valley station of the Karkogel cable car.

Hotel Traunstein offers comfortable rooms, cosy lounges, and a spacious sauna area with an infrared cabin.

Culinary specialities in the restaurant include steaks, homemade pasta dishes, and regular barbecue and buffet evenings.

Hiking, summer tobogganing, miniature golf, and mountaineering in summer, as well as cross-country skiing and skiing in winter, are available in the immediate vicinity of Gasthaus-Landhotel Traunstein. A breakfast buffet, a 2-course dinner, or a 4-course dinner can be booked on arrival.

Description:
Surrounded by a large garden, Haus Könighofer enjoys a quiet location in the centre of Abtenau and offers spacious apartments with a balcony and free Wi-Fi, as well as a sauna. The Sonnleiten Ski Lift is 400 metres away, and the ski bus to the Dachstein West Ski Area stops 150 metres away.

The modern apartments feature 2 bedrooms, a living room with a flat-screen cable TV, a kitchenette, and a bathroom.

Guests of the Könighofer Haus can use a ski and bicycle storage room, and a childrens playground and free private parking are available on site.

A cross-country ski run and a public outdoor pool are 100 metres away. The Dachstein West Ski Area is reachable in 12 km. Please inform Haus Könighofer in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Situated in the quiet countryside, Biohof Haus WIeser offers direct access to Radochsberg Cross-Country Ski Trail and is 7 km from Dachstein-West Ski Resort. Organic products from the farm are served and daily fresh rolls can be delivered upon request. Free Wi-Fi is available.

Rooms and apartments are decorated in simple style. They all have a private bathroom with a shower. The apartment also contains a fully equipped kitchen and a TV.

WIeser Biohof features a petting zoo with farm animals, including cows, goats and chickens. A children playground and outdoor pool is on site as well. The garden comes with barbeque facilities.

Abtenau-Karkogel Ski Resort and Karkogel Summer Toboggan Run are 8 km away. Free private parking is available. Please inform Biohof Haus Wieser in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
Property Location
With a stay at Alpengasthof Döllerhof in Abtenau, you'll be near ski lifts, just steps from Dachstein West Ski Area and a 4-minute drive from Karkogel Cable Car. This pension is 5.6 mi (9 km) from Lammerklamm Gorge and 7.6 mi (12.2 km) from Museum Gererhof.

Rooms
Stay in one of 12 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include separate sitting areas and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at Döllerhof serving guests of Alpengasthof Döllerhof. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 10 AM for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
The front desk is staffed during limited hours. Free self parking is available onsite.

Description:
Surrounded by meadows and mountains, Oberwötzlhof offers an outdoor swimming pool, a spa area and free WiFi, 3 km from the centre of Abtenau and the closest ski lifts. Cosmetic treatments and massages can be requested on site.

Each of the Alpine-style rooms comes with a flat-screen cable TV and a bathroom with a shower. Some rooms also offer a balcony with mountain views. A breakfast buffet is offered daily.

Oberwötzlhof features a garden with a sunbathing lawn, a terrace with sun loungers, and a childrens playground.

A free ski bus stops 200 metres away and the ski areas Dachstein and Postalm are within 18 km. Restaurants and supermarkets can be reached within 1,5 km. Salzburg is 45 km away and several lakes can be reached within 30 minutes by car.  A damage deposit of EUR 300 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.
Swimming pool is closed from Tue 22 Jan 2019 until Sun 30 Jun 2019
A deposit via bank wire is required to secure your reservation. Oberwötzlhof will contact you with instructions after booking.

A security damage deposit will be charged upon arrival.

Description:
Set in Abtenau, Gästehaus Feldmannhof features accommodation with seating area. Complimentary WiFi is offered.

A terrace with mountain views is offered in all units.

A continental breakfast is served daily at the property.

Ski storage space can be found at the bed and breakfast, along with a garden.

Sonnleitn 2 is less than 1 km from Gästehaus Feldmannhof. The nearest airport is Salzburg W. A. Mozart Airport, 48 km from the property.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Karkogel Cable Car

Location : When you stay at Hotel Goldener Stern in Abtenau, you ll be near ski lifts and within a 5-minute drive of Karkogel Cable Car. This 4-star hotel is 2.3 mi (3.7 km) from Tennen Mountains and 6.5 mi (10.4 km) from Lammerklamm Gorge.

Rooms : Stay in one of 33 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Dining : Stop by the hotel s restaurant for lunch or dinner, or grab snacks at the coffee shop/cafe. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8 AM to 10 AM.

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • Guests must contact this property in advance to reserve cribs/infant beds
  • This property accepts credit cards, debit cards, and cash
  • This property uses solar energy, plus a grey water recycling system and eco-friendly cleaning products
  • Safety features at this property include a carbon monoxide detector, a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, a security system, and a first aid kit

Special Instructions : The front desk is open daily from 8 AM - 8:00 PM. If you are planning to arrive after 6 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

Description:
Haus Pendl is located in Abtenau, 12 km from the Dachstein West Ski Area and 450 metres from shops and restaurants in the centre. It offers panoramic mountain views, rooms with free Wi-Fi, and a ski storage room.

The spacious rooms feature a private balcony with scenic mountain views.

Guests can prepare snacks and light meals in the shared dining and lounge room, which includes a microwave and a cosy dining table. The lounge also includes cable TV.

Haus Pendl is 250 metres away from a ski bus stop. A public swimming pool is just a short walk away.

Description:
Offering a terrace with views of the Tennengebirge Mountains, Pension Kapfinger features rooms with rustic furniture. The Sonnleiten ski lift, an ice rink and cross-country tracks are a 10-minute walk away.

With cable TV and a refrigerator, all warmly decorated accommodations at Kapfinger include a private bathroom with a shower. The apartments also have a kitchen with a dining area.

The nearest bus stop is a 5-minute walk away and offers direct access to the Karkogel ski lift in 2 minutes. Cross-country slopes and an ice skating ring are only 20 metres from the property.

With free parking, guests have the opportunity to drive up to the Wolfgangsee, Salzbergwerk Hallein and Eisriesenwelt Werfen, all approximately 40 km away. Please inform Haus Kapfinger in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Dating from 1758, this traditional hotel is located in the centre of Abtenau in the Lammer Valley. It features a sauna and a solarium, and offers horse-drawn sleigh and carriage rides.

The rustic rooms at Hotel Garni Ledererwirt feature bright wooden furniture, cable TV, and a bathroom.

Free private parking is available on site, and there is a bicycle storage room. The ski bus stops right outside and takes guests to the Abtenau ski area in just 2 minutes. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please inform Hotel Garni Ledererwirt in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
